title: Snowdown Capsule and Hextech Chests
body:
So say if I were to buy couple snowdown capsules and hextech chests with keys are they randomized once you open them based on what skins are available the day you open them? Take for example say when samsung galaxy skins come out and you open them is there chance you can get those?

Or once you bought them they are already randomized and selected for you based on the skins you bought the capsules/boxes that day?

Hope this wasn't too confusing :/

replies.body: Those chests and capsules don't have their contents changed or decided based on what you bought that day. The normal chests have randomized content, and Snowdown chests have another list their contents could pull from.
